name: Mortadelo y Filemón: El sulfato atómico
name_original: Mortadelo y Filemón: El sulfato atómico
description: In this game our characters must rescue the atomic sulphate created by professor Bacterio of the claws of Bruteztrausen, general of a enemy state. This sulphate is a spray that increases the size of the insects, making them reach measures of meters!. They will have to enter the State slyly to arrive at the governmental palace and take the sulphate.
